Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

Klasse
Beschreibung
Controller
The controller handles incoming HTTP REST requests and calls the corresponding service method.
Note
A note consists of two basic (string) parts: title and text.
NoteRepository
Note repository representing the storage.
NoteService
Service layer with basic CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete) and a method to obtain all stored notes.
NoteServiceImpl
Concrete implementation of the service layer with constructor injection.
SimpleNoteManagerApplication
Entry point of the backend application.
